translation.en: Yaba! Yaba!
Won't you look at my face when I'm speaking, huh?
translation.zh: ‎我说话的时候 你不能看着我吗？

translation.en: -I will call you. -You're lucky.
Chuks, or whatever they call you, why are you harassing this girl?
translation.zh:
‎喂 朱克斯还是什么名字的
‎你为什么要烦这姑娘？

translation.en: The only men around here are our customers.
She already said she'll call you. Get lost so we can hustle!
translation.zh:
‎她说了会打给你
‎快滚吧 我们要干活！

translation.en: -Was I talking to you? -No, but you are crushing our vibe.
translation.zh:
‎-我刚跟你说话了吗？
‎-没 但你毁了我们这儿的氛围

translation.en: -Your vibe was crushed many years ago. -Just fuck off.
translation.zh:
‎-你们的氛围很多年前就被毁了
‎-滚吧

translation.en: I am leaving, but not because of you. Because I want to.
translation.zh:
‎我会走的 但不是因为你
‎而是因为我想走

translation.en: Idiot! Follow me.
Blessing, why are you with this guy? You don't need him.
translation.zh:
‎布莱辛 你为什么要跟他在一起？
‎你不需要他

translation.en: Vanessa, that's enough.
You don't need this guy.
Babe, is this the Johnny guy you've been talking about?
translation.zh:
‎宝贝 那就是
‎你经常提起的约翰尼吗？

translation.en: Yes, that's him. He's too much trouble.
Where are all the pretty girls?
-Customer! -Hey!
-Hey, handsome. -How are you?
Where have you been?
I've been around. Where have you been?
translation.zh: ‎我一直都在这儿 倒是你去哪儿？

translation.en: I've been here waiting for you.
-What's up? Feel like having fun? -Of course.
But I want a different girl tonight.
Look at me.
You know I'm better in bed than all the girls here.
translation.zh:
‎你知道我的床上功夫
‎比这里所有姑娘的都要好

translation.en: Of course you know.
I know, but variety is the spice of life.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 但变化是生活的情趣

translation.en: Pretty girl, what's your name?
Ehi.
Ehi. I like your name.
Let's go have some fun.
I don't want to upset anyone.
That's a good idea.
Don't worry. No stress. It's an open market.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 没有压力 这是自由市场

translation.en: Everyone is here to make money. If he wants you, go with him.
translation.zh:
‎大家来这儿是想赚钱
‎如果他想和你走 就跟他走呗

translation.en: Who is talking to you?
Enough with the talk. Let's go.
-Bitch, I will show you! -Let it go.
translation.zh:
‎-婊子 我给你好看！
‎-随她去

translation.en: She is stealing my customer.
Let the man choose who he wants.
-That's enough. -Mind your own business.
Forget about it. Come on, let's have a drink.
translation.zh: ‎算了吧 来 咱们喝酒去

translation.en: Welcome, boss.
Give me one condom and one blue pill.
translation.zh: ‎请给我一个避孕套和一粒蓝色药片

translation.en: Try this one. This one is special.
Look how hot your babe is.
May it work well.
Give me the room key.
Here.
-All right. -Enjoy yourself.
Bad guy!
Why are you shaking? I don't bite.
Unless, you want me to bite you.
Come on, let's go in.
Come. Come.
Come on, we don't have all night.
-What? What are you doing? -Nothing, I just want to use the toilet.
translation.zh:
‎-怎么了？你怎么回事？
‎-没事 我只是想用下厕所

translation.en: I'll be right back.
Okay.
Hurry up, I am good to go. Once I take the pill...
translation.zh:
‎快点 我准备好了
‎我一吃了那药丸…

translation.en: Shit.
Hello?
What's going on?
Hello?
Are you crazy? Come here!
Hey! Witch!
Hey!
That witch girl has run off! Catch her! Catch her!
translation.zh: ‎那个疯婊子跑了！抓住她！ ‎抓住她！

translation.en: What's happening?
Ehi, are you okay?
-You're short 500. -But I still have to give Chuks his cut.
translation.zh:
‎-你还欠500
‎-但我还得分给朱克斯

translation.en: That's not my business.
Let him find a house for you. Otherwise, pay me my balance.
translation.zh:
‎让他给你找个房子
‎要不然 就把我的钱给我结了

translation.en: I swear I will bring it tomorrow.
You, come here. What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: ‎你 过来 你怎么回事？

translation.en: You climbed out the window before you got paid.
Are you crazy? Do you want the hotel to kick us out?
translation.zh: ‎你疯了吗？你想让旅馆把我们赶走？

translation.en: -It's not my fault. The man was crazy. -That's a lie.
translation.zh:
‎-不能怪我 那个人很讨厌
‎-她说谎

translation.en: It's not a lie. The man was drunk.
How would you know how to handle a drunk man, rookie?
translation.zh: ‎你太嫩了 应付不了喝醉的客人

translation.en: Vanessa, get out of my sight!
You stole my customer and went out the window without getting paid.
translation.zh:
‎你抢了我的客户
‎居然没拿到钱就爬窗跑了

translation.en: Vanessa, it's okay. That's enough.
translation.zh: ‎瓦内萨 行了 别说了

translation.en: You, go.
Don't cause problems for me, or I'll show you another side of me. Go!
translation.zh:
‎别给我惹麻烦
‎否则我要你好看 滚！

translation.en: And tomorrow, rent is due.
So, if you like, you can keep climbing out of windows.
translation.zh: ‎如果你喜欢 爱爬窗户就爬

translation.en: I heard you.
Useless girl! You can't even be a proper whore.
The next time you steal my customer, I'll break your head.
translation.zh: ‎你再抢我的客户 我就砸了你的脑袋

translation.en: Quiet! You're giving me a headache!
-You okay? -I am.
-Take this. -I don't want it.
It will take the pain away.
Girl, this is no life.
translation.zh: ‎姑娘 这不是人过的生活

translation.en: Tell me about it.
I need to get out of this place.
-Lagos? -Nigeria.
I want to move to a whole new level. Europe.
translation.zh: ‎我想去过另一个水准的生活 去欧洲

translation.en: That's where the real money is.
Do you know anyone who could hook me up with that kind of thing?
translation.zh: ‎你认识能帮我去欧洲的人吗？

translation.en: Because all the guys here are no good, no good at all.
translation.zh: ‎这里的男人没一个好货 差劲透了

translation.en: You think the guys over there are better?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得那儿的男人会更好吗？

translation.en: -Of course. -Oh, girl.
They are the same everywhere.
Let's go to the bathroom so I can help you.
translation.zh: ‎去浴室 我帮你清理伤口

translation.en: Linda, thank you.
Thank you very much.
-You've helped me a lot. -Don't worry about it.
There's a lady who transports women to Europe.
That's why I moved to Lagos.
translation.zh: ‎我就是因为这个才来拉各斯的

translation.en: There's a man I met in Benin who linked me up with the woman.
translation.zh:
‎我在贝宁遇见了一个人
‎他把我介绍给了这个女人

translation.en: So, every month I have to pay her.
When the payment is complete, my sister and I are going to Europe
translation.zh: ‎我一付清 我妹妹和我就能去欧洲

translation.en: to earn a good living for our family.
translation.zh: ‎让我们一家过上更好的生活

translation.en: -How much does it cost to get to Europe? -Like, $1,200.
translation.zh:
‎-要付多少钱才能去欧洲？
‎-差不多1200美元

translation.en: Linda, that's too expensive.
Please could you talk to her on my behalf? I also want to go.
translation.zh:
‎请你替我跟那位女士说说 好吗？
‎我也想去

translation.en: I could, but the woman is very secretive, so I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎可以 但那位女士非常神秘
‎所以我也说不准

translation.en: Try for me. I've been waiting for something like this for a long time.
translation.zh:
‎试着替我求求她吧
‎我等这样的机会等了很久了

translation.en: Please.
What's up?
-Unbelievable! -What's up, man?
It's her that you want?
Okay.
Ehi, he wants you.
-Me? -Yes, you.
Get out of here.
What's up?
I do many things, but not all.
translation.zh: ‎我能做很多事 但不是什么都能做

translation.en: Okay. How much?
It all depends. A hand job is 2,000.
translation.zh: ‎看情况 打飞机 两千

translation.en: A blow job is 4,000.
To fuck is 7,000.
Do you have a place we could use?
Bring some money and we'll find a place. That's easy.
translation.zh:
‎这事容易 你一付钱
‎我们就找个地方去

translation.en: Get in the car.
Linda.
Take care, baby girl.
You should pick a real woman like me. She's a witch.
translation.zh:
‎你该挑个像我这样真正的女人
‎她是个疯婆子

translation.en: Come on, get out of here!
-Whore! -Whore!
Did I tell you that I was a very good actress at school?
translation.zh:
‎我告诉过你
‎我在学校是个很好的演员吗？

translation.en: As long as you know that this is not the real you and you're only undercover.
translation.zh:
‎只要你知道那不是真的
‎你只是在当卧底

translation.en: So, how are you?
Okay, I guess.
A few close shaves.
You are going to give me a heart attack.
You're too young for a heart attack. High blood pressure, maybe.
translation.zh:
‎你这么年轻得不了心脏病
‎得高血压倒有可能

translation.en: Ms. Ehi, how are you today?
translation.zh: ‎艾希女士 你今天还好吗？

translation.en: I'm good.
What's happened to make you sit here like this?
translation.zh: ‎出什么事了？你怎么一个人在这儿？

translation.en: Any problem?
No.
I'm okay.
Who did this to you? Was it Chuks?
translation.zh: ‎是谁把你打成这样的？是朱克斯吗？

translation.en: Why would he act this way?
I upset him.
Blessing, what are you still doing with this guy?
translation.zh: ‎布莱辛 你为什么还跟他在一起？

translation.en: Blessing, you don't need him anymore.
You don't need him. You need to leave this guy.
translation.zh: ‎你不需要他 赶紧离开他

translation.en: Why don't you do like other girls do and join a dating app like Lovers Zone?
translation.zh:
‎为什么不像其他女孩那样
‎用那个叫“情人区”的应用呢？

translation.en: He would kill me.
There were a lot of other girls with him in the past. I'm the only with him now.
translation.zh: ‎他以前带很多姑娘 现在他只剩我了

translation.en: So I know he'll kill me if I try to leave him.
translation.zh:
‎所以我知道
‎如果我要走 他会杀了我

translation.en: How would I dare?
How would I dare?
Thank you. Thank you.
I will be up soon.
Sure?
Thank you.
You got lucky.
This is the payment for my sister and me.
Auntie, will she still be able to go with us?
translation.zh: ‎姐 她还能跟我们一起走吗？

translation.en: -How old is she? -Seventeen.
-Is she still a virgin? -Yes.
Make sure she remains that way.
Thank you, Auntie.
Auntie?
Please don't be offended.
How long after full payment can we expect to leave?
translation.zh:
‎我们付清全款以后
‎大概什么时候能走？

translation.en: I can't say. It depends on a lot of things.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 有很多决定因素

translation.en: But I'll call you when everything is set.
Maybe like two days before we go.
Because I have to bring her from Benin to Lagos.
translation.zh: ‎因为我还得把她从贝宁带到拉各斯

translation.en: That's what you're worried about? Bring your luggage to Lagos
translation.zh:
‎你担心这个啊？
‎把你们的行李带去拉各斯

translation.en: because if we're ready to go and you're not ready...
translation.zh:
‎如果我们准备好出发
‎而你们没准备好的话…

translation.en: What are you looking for here?
Why did you push me like that? Who are you?
Madam, I found this girl spying on you.
translation.zh: ‎女士 这女的一直在监视你

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -Nothing.
I was in my shop when this man took me. I was about to call the police.
translation.zh:
‎他骚扰我时 我就在自己的店里
‎我正准备报警

translation.en: Do you know this girl?
Am I not talking to you? Do you know her?
translation.zh:
‎没听到我在和你说话吗？
‎你认识她吗？

translation.en: Yes, she is my friend.
Didn't I tell you not to discuss this issue with anyone?
translation.zh: ‎我没告诉你别和任何人说这事吗？

translation.en: Auntie, I'm sorry.
Auntie, it's not her fault. I have been bugging her.
translation.zh: ‎姐 不是她的错 我一直缠着她问

translation.en: I want to go to Europe.
I swear, she didn't tell me anything. I followed her here.
translation.zh:
‎我发誓 她什么也没告诉我
‎是我跟踪她来的

translation.en: -Is that true? -I swear, Auntie.
I didn't discuss you with her. I swear.
translation.zh: ‎我没跟她说你的事 我发誓

translation.en: Look, I don't like anyone spying on me.
translation.zh: ‎听着 我讨厌任何人监视我

translation.en: Auntie, please, don't be angry. Can you still help me?
translation.zh:
‎姐 对不起 别生气
‎你还能帮我吗？

translation.en: That is not how it works.
Do you understand? It doesn't work like that.
translation.zh: ‎你明白吗？我不是这样做事的

translation.en: Please don't be angry. I just want to go.
translation.zh: ‎求求你别生气 我只是太想去欧洲了

translation.en: Just keep your mouths shut.
Get out of here!
Linda! Linda, wait please!
Didn't I tell you I'd speak to her? Isn't that what I told you?
translation.zh:
‎我没告诉你我会跟她说吗？
‎我没这么告诉过你吗？

translation.en: Linda, please, I'm sorry. I know I really fucked up.
translation.zh:
‎琳达 求你了 我真的很抱歉
‎我知道我搞砸了

translation.en: You're crazy! Go away.
Do you know how I have suffered for this?
translation.zh: ‎你知道我为这事费了多大劲？

translation.en: How much I've paid?
It's my last chance and you want to fuck it up.
translation.zh:
‎这是我最后的机会
‎现在你他妈想毁了它

translation.en: Linda, forgive me. Linda!
Fuck!
What? What are you saying?
How did that happen?
No. Don't do that to me. You told me you could sort it out.
translation.zh:
‎不行 别这样对我
‎你说过你可以搞定的

translation.en: Find another one. I already told my boss the number.
translation.zh:
‎再找一个
‎我已经告诉我老板女孩的数量了

translation.en: Fifteen has to be fifteen.
That's none of my business. Just get it done.
I'm going to the office. Meet me there.
translation.zh: ‎我正往办公室去 在那儿等我

translation.en: What's happening?
Have you got a pen?
One sec.
-Hey. -I met a trafficker today.
translation.zh:
‎-好了
‎-我今天见了一个人贩子

translation.en: A madam who takes people to Europe.
translation.zh: ‎一个带人偷渡去欧洲的女人

translation.en: She goes by the name of Alero.
Probably an ex-prostitute.
She drives a Toyota Prado.
Registration number, KTU-447CV.
Just see if there's anything you can find out about her for me.
translation.zh: ‎看看你能不能给我找到任何她的信息

translation.en: -All right. Stay safe. -All right. Bye.
translation.zh:
‎-好的 注意安全
‎-好 再见

translation.en: Who is that?
It's me, Mommy!
My daughter.
-How are you? -I am fine.
That's good. I'm happy to hear that.
translation.zh: ‎那就好 真高兴知道你很好

translation.en: -Are you hungry? -Thank you, Mom.
Good. Alright, sit down.
Sit down.
What can I offer you? Water? Rice?
I've already eaten.
I insist. I will bring food anyway. You can choose not to eat it.
translation.zh:
‎我一定要给你拿点吃的
‎你吃不吃随便

translation.en: Leave me alone.
What is this?
It's rice I bought as a peace offering. Forgive me.
Please take it.
This smells like home-cooked food.
Yes, that's why I brought it for you.
translation.zh: ‎对 所以我要给你带这个

translation.en: Thank you.
I hope that woman isn't too upset with you?
translation.zh: ‎我希望那位女士没太生你的气

translation.en: I don't think so. She just called me.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得没事 她刚给我打电话了

translation.en: She wants me to organize a group of girls.
There's a party tomorrow evening at a politician's house.
translation.zh: ‎明天去一个政客家里参加派对

translation.en: -She said to invite you. -Are you serious?
-So should I tell her you'll come? -Why not!
Thank you.
Chuks, please!
You fuck up sometimes, hmm?
You know you fucked up?
-Please! -I've been watching you.
I know you are hiding something.
I can tell a prostitute when I see one.
And you...
You are not a prostitute. So, who are you?
translation.zh: ‎你不是妓女 你到底是谁？

translation.en: Who are you? Are you from the police?
I could kill you right here and nothing would happen.
translation.zh:
‎我可以现在就杀了你
‎什么也不会发生

translation.en: Just another dead whore.
translation.zh: ‎只不过又死了一个婊子而已

translation.en: If you ever tell Blessing to leave me again,
I will kill you!
Do you hear me?
Babes, I am off to see my customer.
translation.zh: ‎姑娘们 我要去见我的客人了

translation.en: Enjoy.
You'll make lots of money today!
-So, I can't come with you? -Sorry, you weren't invited.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么我不能跟你们一块去？
‎-抱歉 没邀请你

translation.en: Why wasn't I invited?
Maybe she doesn't want someone who has a pimp.
translation.zh: ‎-也许她不想要有皮条客的姑娘

translation.en: Blessing, please move.
-Good evening, ma. -Good evening.
Quick.
You know the routine, right?
There will be a lot of money to go around, and because of that...
everything is allowed.
You do whatever the men want.
translation.zh: ‎男人让你们做什么就做什么

translation.en: -Understand? -Yes, ma.
Let's go.
Take care of him. He's my special customer.
translation.zh: ‎伺候好他 他是个特殊客人

translation.en: Isn't this our spy?
Please forgive me. I know I messed up.
translation.zh: ‎请原谅我 我知道我搞砸了

translation.en: You messed up really badly.
I didn't tell you my name. My name is Ehi.
translation.zh: ‎我还没告诉你我的名字 我叫艾希

translation.en: You can call me Alero.
Auntie, please, can you help me get to Europe?
translation.zh: ‎姐 拜托 你能帮我去欧洲吗？

translation.en: -You want to go to Europe? -Yes.
Let's see how you perform tonight. We can discuss it later.
translation.zh:
‎先看看你今晚表现如何
‎可以迟点再谈

translation.en: There is someone I want to introduce you to.
Sir Phillip, forget about politics for a moment.
translation.zh: ‎菲利普爵士 先放下政治

translation.en: I told you I had someone special to introduce you to.
translation.zh:
‎我跟你说过
‎会介绍一位特别的朋友给你

translation.en: Yes.
Ehi, meet Sir Phillip.
translation.zh: ‎艾希 来拜见菲利普爵士

translation.en: Our host.
Ehi. How are you?
Pleased to meet you, sir.
I can see you like it here.
It's beautiful.
You haven't even seen the best parts of it.
I can take you on a tour. Would you like that?
translation.zh: ‎我能带你参观一圈 要不要啊？

translation.en: I would like that.
Good.
Let me show you the splendor.
translation.zh: ‎我带你看看锦绣堂皇的东西

translation.en: And... please,
don't call me Sir Phillip.
You can call me by my name. Phillip.
translation.zh: ‎你可以直呼我的名字菲利普

translation.en: It's so beautiful here.
It's an excellent location for a party,
you know, with an exquisite view of the city.
There's something about Lagos lights that gets to me.
translation.zh:
‎拉各斯晚上的灯光
‎有某些特质打动了我

translation.en: It's awesome.
Okay, you, pop it and pour it.
Here you go.
I hardly drink alcohol.
Me, too. I don't drink.
It's just that this is not a normal drink.
And this is the finest champagne in the world.
Try it. You'll like it.
Okay, let me...
I am so sorry, sir.
That's okay.
What the fuck?
Fuck.
Are you all right in there?
Yes, sir!
I don't know what's wrong with me.
I think I'm sick. Please, I need to go home.
translation.zh: ‎我不舒服 拜托你 我得回家

translation.en: No worries. I can take care of that.
Please, I want to leave.
Wait.
At least let the pill begin to work first.
Please, sir.
I am pleading with you in the name of God.
Please don't do this to me.
Please.
Everything you said and more.
What a dream.
Alero, we will be having another party next month.
translation.zh: ‎阿莱罗 我们下个月会再办一场派对

translation.en: Sir Phillip...
I can't wait to see what you'll come up with next.
translation.zh: ‎我等不及看到你接下来会准备什么

translation.en: Always a pleasure doing business with you.
Alero.
Whore!
Whore!
Wake up! The party is over. The bus is leaving.
translation.zh: ‎醒醒！派对结束了 大巴要开走了

translation.en: "Purge me with hyssop,
and I shall be clean.
Wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.
Make me to hear joy and gladness,
translation.zh: ‎求你使我得听欢喜快乐的声音

translation.en: that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.
translation.zh: ‎使你所压伤的骨头可以踊跃

translation.en: Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.
translation.zh:
‎求你掩面不看我的罪
‎涂抹我一切的罪孽

translation.en: Create in me a clean heart, O God,
translation.zh: ‎神啊 求你为我造清洁的心

translation.en: and renew a right spirit within me."
-When last did you speak with her? -Yesterday.
translation.zh:
‎-你最后一次和她说话是什么时候？
‎-昨天

translation.en: Before she went for the damn party.
Now she's not responding to messages or returning my calls.
translation.zh: ‎现在她不回我的信息或电话

translation.en: Emeka, it's barely 24 hours.
Give it some time before you begin to panic.
What if something has happened to her?
The longer we wait, the worse her situation could get.
translation.zh: ‎我们等得越久 她的处境可能就越糟

translation.en: I'm sure nothing has happened to her.
She probably is just sleeping it off.
Emeka, relax.
In the evening, go check the normal places.
translation.zh: ‎晚上去平常那几个地方看看

translation.en: If you don't find her, then we'll know there's a problem.
translation.zh:
‎如果你找不到她
‎那我们就知道出事了

translation.en: Sorry, sir, I don't think I can wait.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 长官 我不能等这么久

translation.en: If I have to, I'll go to that house and find out exactly what happened.
translation.zh:
‎如果有必要的话 我会去那栋房子
‎查出她到底出了什么事

translation.en: And what if, contrary to your expectations,
nothing actually happened to her?
translation.zh: ‎她什么事也没有 那怎么办？

translation.en: You think she will appreciate you having blown her cover?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得她会高兴
‎你暴露了她的卧底身份？

translation.en: So this is where you are.
I've been looking for you.
I have something for you.
What is that?
Take it and don't ask me questions.
It's your cash from the other night.
You should have heard the way Phillip spoke about you.
translation.zh:
‎你真该看看菲利普先生
‎对你念念不忘那样子

translation.en: Do you still want to go to Europe?
I may have space for you on my next trip.
translation.zh: ‎我下一批可能给你留个位置

translation.en: With the way you look, you're what we call "forza speciale."
translation.zh:
‎按你现在的行情
‎你属于我们所说的“特别小组”

translation.en: What's that?
That means you won't walk the streets like a common whore.
translation.zh: ‎意思是你不用像普通妓女一样去站街

translation.en: You will be escorting VIPs. That is what I did.
translation.zh: ‎你会陪同贵宾 我之前就干这个

translation.en: But if you want to go, you have to pay me.
translation.zh: ‎但如果你想去欧洲 你得付我钱

translation.en: It will cost $1,200.
Yes?
Okay.
I'll call you.
I see you are still interfering in matters that do not concern you.
translation.zh: ‎我看你还在干涉跟你无关的事

translation.en: -Are you talking to me? -Yes, and you heard me.
translation.zh:
‎-你在跟我说话吗？
‎-是 你听见了

translation.en: Don't interfere with my business.
Chuks, what are you saying?
Leave my babe.
Did you hear me?
-I didn't come here to visit your babe. -I believe you.
translation.zh:
‎-我不是过来看你的妓女
‎-我相信你

translation.en: What's my business with your ugly babe?
Ugly? I'll show you what ugly is today.
translation.zh: ‎丑？我今天让你见识什么是丑

translation.en: Be careful.
Listen, man, I'm not afraid of your muscles.
Get out of my sight or I'll smack you.
translation.zh: ‎别让我看见 否则我揍扁你

translation.en: What's your problem?
Better think before you get hurt.
translation.zh: ‎你最好动动脑子 免得受伤

translation.en: Leave him.
Chuks...
I feel sorry for you, because your time has passed and you don't even realize it.
translation.zh:
‎我替你难过 你的时代已经过去了
‎可你还没有意识到

translation.en: You're here living in analog mode while everyone else has gone digital.
translation.zh:
‎你活在单一模式里
‎可所有人都用上了数码模式

translation.en: Look, man, your time has passed. It's my time now.
translation.zh:
‎你的时代已经过去了
‎现在是我的时代

translation.en: There is nothing you have that I want because everything you touch is messed up.
translation.zh:
‎我不想要你的东西
‎因为你碰过的东西就会搞砸

translation.en: -Fuck you! -Fuck you!
-Motherfucker! -Fuck off.
What happened?
What do you want?
Can we talk?
Come into my office.
Seems like you're finally thinking straight.
translation.zh: ‎看起来你的脑子终于清醒了

translation.en: How?
I thought you wanted to become one of my girls.
Chuks, please, that's not what I came to discuss.
translation.zh: ‎朱克斯 拜托 我找你谈是有别的事

translation.en: So what do you want?
Please...
do you know anyone who can help me teach someone a lesson?
translation.zh: ‎你认识人能帮我教训一个人吗？

translation.en: I mean, I want them to hurt him badly.
Who's the target?
He is really important.
-How important? -He's a politician.
Hold on.
What's going on?
Can you or can't you?
Look, it's not that I can't...
but with the way these important men move about with security, it's a bad idea.
translation.zh:
‎但是这些大人物出入都有安保保护
‎这不是个好主意

translation.en: Babe, you see...
any time an important man hurts you, you should accept it as work experience.
translation.zh:
‎如果显赫的人伤害了你
‎你就当那是工作经验 接受它

translation.en: Experience and lesson.
You can't hurt an important man.
translation.zh: ‎对于这么显赫的人 你什么也做不了

translation.en: You see...
If you were one of my girls, I would protect you...
translation.zh: ‎如果你是我的女孩 我就会保护你…

translation.en: The way you protect Blessing, right?
You know, in this game, many people act like the Mafia.
translation.zh: ‎干这一行的 很多人都装黑帮

translation.en: But these guys are the real Mafia.
In fact, they started it.
So if I fuck up, they will kill me.
translation.zh: ‎所以如果我搞砸了 他们会杀了我

translation.en: If you fuck with me, I'll have to kill you.
translation.zh: ‎如果你对我乱来 我不得不杀了你

translation.en: -Tony-- -Let me finish.
If you tell me you have 15 babes,
and I tell them that there are 15 babes available...
it must be exactly 15 babes.
Alero.
Fifteen is fifteen,
not fourteen.
I have 15 babes.
Because I heard that one of your babes left.
translation.zh: ‎因为我听说你的一个女孩走了

translation.en: Yes, but I don't-- I'll get another one.
translation.zh: ‎是 但我不…我会再找一个

translation.en: Let me see her.
This one is a forza speciale.
But she looks like trouble.
The pretty ones come with a lot of trouble.
I know.
Has she paid?
She will pay.
You sure?
Because you told me that you have 15 babes.
Fifteen has to be fifteen.
I'm sure she will pay.
Okay.
Hello, Mom. It's me, Linda.
translation.zh: ‎喂 妈妈 是我 琳达

translation.en: Hello, my child! How are things with you?
Everything's fine here.
Everything is working out for Beauty and me.
translation.zh: ‎美人和我的计划进行得很顺利

translation.en: That's great news! Thanks for everything you're doing for your family.
translation.zh:
‎真是好消息！
‎谢谢你为你的家人所做的一切

translation.en: -Don’t worry about it. -Thank you.
Well done.
I will continue to pray for you and your sister.
translation.zh: ‎我会继续为你和你妹妹祈祷

translation.en: Yes, mother.
-Is Beauty there? -Yes, she is.
Can I speak with her?
-Beauty! -I'm coming!
Come quickly. Your sister wants to talk to you.
translation.zh: ‎快来 你姐姐想跟你说话

translation.en: She's coming.
-I'm here, Mom. -Your sister wants to talk to you.
translation.zh:
‎-我来了 妈妈
‎-你姐姐想跟你说话

translation.en: Hello! Linda, how are you?
How are you, Beauty? Start getting ready. It's time to come to Lagos.
translation.zh:
‎你好吗 美人？
‎做好准备 该来拉各斯了

translation.en: Okay, I hear you, I hear you.
I called my sister and told her I've paid all the money.
translation.zh:
‎我给我妹打电话 告诉她
‎我把我们的钱都付清了

translation.en: You should have heard how happy she was!
She was just shouting, "Europe, Europe!"
Will you be able to come with us?
I don't know. It's a lot of money.
That's true.
Which one of you is Ehi?
Her.
Some man is looking for you.
He's handsome.
How are you, mister?
Cut the bullshit. Why haven't you been answering my calls?
translation.zh: ‎别废话了 ‎你为什么不回我电话？

translation.en: Do you want a hand job, blow job or full fuck?
Just enter the car.
Please.
Please.
What is going on?
Are you going to say something or not?
Only if you calm down.
I really can't deal with anyone shouting right now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在真的受不了任何人对我嚷嚷

translation.en: Okay.
Òlòtūré,
what happened?
Nothing.
Did something happen at the party?
No.
Then why are you acting strange?
translation.zh: ‎那你为什么表现得这么奇怪？

translation.en: Because I am tired.
Staying awake all day and most of the night has that effect on you.
translation.zh:
‎白天一直保持清醒
‎晚上大多数时候也这样 让人很累

translation.en: How was the party?
Just a party.
Rich people doing what they love to do.
It's over.
I need you back at work.
I met the trafficker.
And she had agreed to take me to Europe.
Well, that's...
That's great. That's what we wanted, right?
translation.zh: ‎太好了 我们就希望这样 对吧？

translation.en: This story is not finished.
What are you talking about?
I am saying there is so much more to this story that needs to be told.
translation.zh: ‎我是说这件事还有太多内容要讲

translation.en: So many people that need to be brought down.
Okay, that's it.
I don't know where this is coming from,
or what it is, but it's not up for conversation anymore.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道这是什么意思
‎但这没什么好谈的

translation.en: You're off the story.
Look, Emeka, this is no longer your story.
translation.zh: ‎听着 埃梅卡 这不再是你的新闻了

translation.en: It is now my story.
And I will get to the end of it with or without you.
translation.zh: ‎无论有没有你参与 我都会跟到底

translation.en: Auntie Alero.
-Good afternoon. -Do I know you?
My name is Blessing.
I stay at Sandra's house with Ehi and Linda.
translation.zh: ‎我和艾希、琳达一起住桑德拉那儿

translation.en: Aren't you Chuks' girl?
Yes, I am.
What do you want from me?
-I just want to improve my life. -No, no, no.
translation.zh:
‎-我就是想过好一点的生活
‎-别

translation.en: I have already saved $200. I will make more soon.
translation.zh:
‎我已经存了200美元
‎我很快会赚更多

translation.en: Blessing, no.
I just want to improve my life a bit. To get to the next level, please.
translation.zh:
‎求你了 我只是想让自己好过一点
‎上一个层次

translation.en: I don't deal with girls that have pimps.
translation.zh: ‎我不跟有皮条客的姑娘做生意

translation.en: And you know Chuks is crazy. So I just can't.
translation.zh:
‎你也知道朱克斯是个疯子
‎所以我真的不能

translation.en: Don't mind that local whore!
The motherfucker thought she could ruin my business?
translation.zh: ‎那个混蛋以为她能搞臭我的生意？

translation.en: I will show that bitch that I'm the last bus stop.
translation.zh: ‎我会让那个婊子知道我不是好惹的

translation.en: Okay. Tomorrow.
We are leaving tomorrow.
Sorry I'm late.
-Where did you go? -I went to the market.
I didn't know it would take so long. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道会去这么久的 对不起

translation.en: Chuks, is something wrong?
You know...
I thought you and I had a deep connection.
translation.zh: ‎我本以为你和我挺处得来的

translation.en: Of course, we do. I know we have a deep connection.
translation.zh: ‎当然了 我们是挺处得来的

translation.en: Are you sure?
Of course I'm sure.
Are you really sure?
Yes, of course.
Why are you asking me all these questions?
Because if you and I really have a deep connection,
translation.zh: ‎因为如果我们真的处得来的话

translation.en: you wouldn't have gone to beg Alero to take you to Europe.
translation.zh:
‎为什么你去见阿莱罗
‎求她带你去欧洲？

translation.en: Chuks, please.
Don't worry.
Don't worry.
I know you won't do it again.
Stupid, stupid, stupid!
Take off this wig.
Stupid!
-Beauty! -Linda!
Where's your bag?
Come. Which one?
Were you tired?
Look at you! How's Mom?
Mom is fine.
Please.
Come back to me.
I will.
I want you to keep this for me.
What's this?
It's my report
of everything that has happened while I've been in the house.
translation.zh: ‎记录了我住在那房子时发生的一切

translation.en: I should get going.
Quick, quick, quick.
Auntie Alero, this is my sister I told you about.
translation.zh: ‎阿莱罗姐 这是我妹 我跟你说过的

translation.en: Get on the bus. Quick, quick, quick.
-Get on the bus. Quick, quick, quick. -Get on.
Move.
Wait. I don't understand.
I thought he had good grades in school.
But there was no money to finish school.
translation.zh: ‎但我们没有钱让他完成学业

translation.en: No money? What happened to all the money I sent home?
translation.zh:
‎没钱？我寄回家的所有钱
‎你们都用来干吗了？

translation.en: It was used to buy food. It didn't even last long.
Don't worry.
Once we reach Europe, we'll send more money home.
translation.zh:
‎我们一到欧洲
‎就能寄更多的钱回家了

translation.en: Yeah?
Come.
Chuks is an old-fashioned pimp
who is fast becoming redundant in the modern world.
translation.zh: ‎在现代世界很快就没了生意

translation.en: Years ago, he would've had many girls.
translation.zh: ‎多年前 他手下有很多女孩

translation.en: But times have changed with the Internet, and apps like Lover's Zone
translation.zh:
‎但时代变了
‎互联网和“情人区”这样的应用

translation.en: have replaced men like him.
But desperation creates danger,
and Chuks prowls the pavement like a hungry bear.
translation.zh:
‎朱克斯
‎就像一头饥饿的熊那样搜寻人行道

translation.en: Blessing is Chuks' last girl.
translation.zh: ‎布莱辛是朱克斯最后的姑娘

translation.en: She's an orphan,
and was abused by the state since she was a kid.
translation.zh: ‎自从她是个孩子时就被这个国家虐待

translation.en: Broken, bruised and battered,
Blessing cannot escape Chuks' grasp.
translation.zh: ‎布莱辛摆脱不了朱克斯的控制

translation.en: He has too much power over her,
and she has nowhere else to go.
And the two of them seem to be an inexorable slow train to disaster.
translation.zh:
‎他们俩像一列慢车
‎不可阻挡地驶向灾难

translation.en: All right, all right!
Everybody come down!
All of you, out of the bus, now.
-Bring your bags down! -Get down!
Sheriff, get on and bring everyone out.
translation.zh: ‎谢里夫 上车去让所有人下来

translation.en: Can't you all hear?
Bring your bags down now.
Bring your bags. Straight line here.
translation.zh: ‎拿下你们的包 排成直线

translation.en: Line up, line up, line up.
-Take your bags over there to be searched. -Move!
translation.zh:
‎-拿上包过来 等待搜查
‎-快走！

translation.en: -Let them be searched. -All of you open your bags!
All phones here. Put your phones here. Okay, open it.
translation.zh:
‎你们都把手机放在这儿
‎好 把包打开

translation.en: You can go.
Open your bag.
From now till you get to Europe,
no more communication with anyone.
Move! You, move!
-Where is your phone? -I don't have a phone.
-Why are you lying? -I do not have a phone. Honest.
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么撒谎？
‎-我没有手机 是真的

translation.en: -Do you want me to slap you? -No, sir.
translation.zh:
‎-你想让我扇你吗？
‎-不 先生

translation.en: -Where's your phone? -I don't have one.
Open up!
Now that you're here,
everyone must be quiet and calm. Quiet.
translation.zh: ‎就必须安安静静的 别说话

translation.en: Move!
We ask the questions, we answer the questions.
Do you understand?
-I said, do you understand? -Yes, sir!
A.
B.
C.
C.
B.
A. Come.
A.
A.
Over here. B.
A.
-She is my sister. -What did I say earlier?
You better keep your mouth shut.
I do not who care she is.
You hear me?
B!
A!
A.
The last thing I remember,
he was on top of me.
His breath was all in my face.
I tried to fight him off, but my body was not working anymore
translation.zh:
‎我努力反抗他
‎但因为药物 我的身体

translation.en: because of the drugs.
The doctor confirmed next day
that I had been brutally raped.
There was no condom involved.
This is a well-known man. A politician.
translation.zh: ‎他是个知名的政客 一个政客

translation.en: His name is Sir Phillip Ondaje.
This is what he does for fun.
He drugs women and he rapes them.
You've reached Ehi. Drop a message after the tone.
translation.zh: ‎这是艾希的电话 请在提示音后留言

translation.en: Thank you.
Oh, my goodness, Òlòtūré. Where are you?
translation.zh: ‎上帝啊 奥鲁特里 你在哪儿？

translation.en: You need to come in.
You need to come in immediately.
And please call me once you get this.
-Why did they divide us into groups? -I have no idea.
translation.zh:
‎-我们为什么被分组？
‎-我不知道

translation.en: I am worried about not being with my sister.
translation.zh: ‎我担心不能和我妹妹在一起

translation.en: That's not a problem, is it?
-Yes. -You don't understand.
She is not street-smart like me. I have to protect her.
translation.zh:
‎她不像我这样有街头智慧
‎我得保护她

translation.en: Look...
She is a virgin.
Yes.
That's why Auntie Alero agreed to take her.
translation.zh: ‎所以阿莱罗姐才同意带上她

translation.en: Auntie, there's some guy outside looking for Ehi.
translation.zh: ‎姐 外面有个男的在找艾希

translation.en: Sir, Ehi is not here. She and Linda moved out today.
translation.zh:
‎先生 艾希和琳达不在
‎她们今天搬走了

translation.en: -Where are they right now? -I don't know.
And they didn't give me any notice. Now I have to find two new tenants.
translation.zh:
‎她们甚至没提前跟我说
‎现在我还得找两个新租客

translation.en: So, you don't know--
I said, I don't know anything. Ask the other girls.
translation.zh:
‎我说了我什么都不知道
‎问问其他姑娘

translation.en: -Customer, what's up? -Please, I am looking for Ehi.
translation.zh:
‎-客人 你想找乐子吗？
‎-求你件事 我在找艾希

translation.en: Even when the bitch is not here, she is still ruining my business.
translation.zh:
‎就算那婊子不在了
‎她还在破坏我生意

translation.en: -Please leave. -Please, do you know where she is?
translation.zh:
‎-滚吧
‎-拜托 你知道她在哪儿吗？

translation.en: You won't find her.
They all left for Italy.
-When did they leave? -They left this afternoon.
translation.zh:
‎-她们什么时候走的？
‎-今天下午

translation.en: Customer, you've fallen in love with a prostitute.
I know your type, handsome. You're quick to fall in love.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你这种人 帅气、多情种

translation.en: Here's what will happen. You'll follow me inside.
I'll help you forget Ehi in a heartbeat.
translation.zh: ‎我保证你会在一秒钟内忘掉艾希

translation.en: Thank you.
You're rejecting a good offer. Thank you.
Are you looking for freebies? Is that why you're looking for Ehi?
translation.zh:
‎你在找免费货色吗？
‎这就是为什么你在找艾希吗？

translation.en: Hi.
I know you read the stuff, but I can't talk right now.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你读了那些
‎但我现在不能说话

translation.en: Just listen to me carefully.
-Okay. -I am one hour northwest away from Lagos.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-我离拉各斯西北一个小时车程

translation.en: My last turn was at Agbara.
My sense is we're going to be here for the next few days.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉我们接下来几天还会在这儿

translation.en: Hey, hey. Listen.
We will come and get you.
Okay, but I have to go now.
I love you.
I have to go. Bye.
Posture is very important in Europe.
You'll need to stand up straight. You see how I'm standing?
translation.zh: ‎得站直了 看到我的站姿吗？

translation.en: Make sure all your God-given assets are on display.
translation.zh: ‎一定要展示出上帝给你们的资本

translation.en: You must display them.
You, let me see your stomach.
Lift it up. Let us see.
Your tits and your ass. Make sure they are on display.
translation.zh:
‎你的胸 还有你的屁股
‎一定要展示出来

translation.en: That's how to make real money in Europe.
translation.zh: ‎你们这样才能在欧洲挣大钱

translation.en: Yes.
See her? She is what we call forza speciale
translation.zh:
‎看到她没？
‎我们说这种人是“特别小组”的

translation.en: and if any of you want to be a forza speciale,
you have to do everything we're teaching you here.
translation.zh: ‎现在该好好学 照我们教的去做

translation.en: -Do you understand? -Yes.
You. Let's see you catwalk.
translation.zh: ‎你走个猫步 让我们看看

translation.en: Shake that butt. Move your hips. God gave them to you, don't hide them.
translation.zh:
‎扭屁股 髋部摆起来
‎这是上帝给你的资本 别藏着

translation.en: Shake it if you want to make money in Europe.
Can you all see her? Take a good look at her. Come back.
translation.zh:
‎你们都看见她没有？
‎好好看她 回来

translation.en: You. You're up next.
Okay, now.
You know how to do that. Nothing to teach you there. Step aside.
translation.zh: ‎你很懂 没什么可教你的 站旁边去

translation.en: Hey, look here.
You over there, looking down.
Come here.
Can you lap dance?
No need to look like that. It's no big deal.
translation.zh: ‎没必要哭丧着脸 没什么大不了的

translation.en: Just go down.
Make sure your pussy rubs against his dick.
translation.zh: ‎用你的小妹妹去擦他的小鸡鸡

translation.en: I never repeat myself.
Show me what you got.
Bring your ass here.
She's got the tits and the ass. What is she doing?
translation.zh: ‎她有胸有臀 这是搞什么？

translation.en: Shake it.
Sheriff, can you feel her pussy?
translation.zh: ‎谢里夫 你能感觉到她的小妹妹吗？

translation.en: I can't feel shit. She's too stiff.
translation.zh: ‎毛也感觉不到 她太僵硬了

translation.en: Hey, grind it properly!
-Sheriff, you should also be helping her. -Grind!
translation.zh:
‎-谢里夫 你也要帮一下她
‎-磨啊！

translation.en: -Installer. -That's right. And no virus.
translation.zh:
‎-硬了
‎-没错 而且她很干净

translation.en: She is doing all right.
Okay. You can stop.
-Move aside. -Babe, move aside.
Move over here.
You next.
Come. Come when I call you!
What's wrong with you?
-Do you have epilepsy? -This one looks like an expert.
translation.zh:
‎-你有癫痫病吗？
‎-这个看起来像专家

translation.en: -She knows what she's doing. -She's a professional.
Yeah, gently.
Sheriff, Sheriff, hold her.
I'm so confused. You don't understand.
All right, that's enough. Step aside.
Step aside. You cry too much.
translation.zh: ‎靠边去 你哭得太厉害了

translation.en: You're a piece of work.
Where is the girl with the big butt?
This is an emergency. I have one of my staff members in there.
translation.zh: ‎这是紧急情况 ‎我有一个员工在那里面

translation.en: She's a journalist with more bravery than sense.
translation.zh: ‎她是个记者 勇气多过理智

translation.en: I need to get her out.
I hear you, Mr. Okoye.
translation.zh: ‎我听见你的话了 奥科耶先生

translation.en: All my men are out there on special operations today.
translation.zh:
‎我全部的人
‎今天都派出去执行特殊任务了

translation.en: It's not possible.
When is the earliest you're able to go?
Well...
If everything in your story checks out,
translation.zh: ‎如果你故事里的一切都核实了

translation.en: the absolute earliest
would be dawn tomorrow morning.
Yes.
It is well.
That is it.
So you like to drug and rape young women?
translation.zh:
‎原来你喜欢给年轻女孩下药
‎然后强奸她们

translation.en: Excuse me?
I'm the editor of The Scoop.
I know you and I know what you do.
translation.zh: ‎我知道你 也知道你做了什么

translation.en: I'm coming for you and your sick friends.
translation.zh: ‎我会对付你和你那些恶心的朋友

translation.en: Prick!
I, Ehi, do swear by the gods...
translation.zh: ‎我 艾希 对上帝发誓…

translation.en: ...that if I dare cross my sponsors...
...I will find myself in the coffin...
...and so shall it be.
We have confirmed from our colleagues in the police.
translation.zh: ‎我们收到了警方同事的确认

translation.en: We would... have a task force for dawn tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎我们明天黎明会派出特遣队

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you, thank you.
Thank you very much. You won't be sorry about this, I promise.
translation.zh: ‎太谢谢你了 你不会后悔的 我保证

translation.en: I need you to leave, Mr. Okoye.
translation.zh: ‎我要求你离开 奥科耶先生

translation.en: Yeah.
I suppose I'm not allowed to join you for the operation tomorrow?
translation.zh:
‎我猜你们不被允许我
‎参加明天的行动？

translation.en: No.
It's an official operation. Definitely not.
translation.zh: ‎是官方行动 你当然不能参与

translation.en: Right.
Thank you. Thank you.
Next.
Please, can I read the contract before I sign?
translation.zh: ‎拜托 在签合同前我能读一下吗？

translation.en: Of course.
You have ten seconds to read and sign.
-Any problem? -No. Not at all.
translation.zh:
‎-有问题吗？
‎-没有 完全没有

translation.en: Sign.
Auntie, when do we leave?
When it's time to go, we'll go. Next!
translation.zh: ‎到时候我们就走 下一次！

translation.en: What's up?
What did you get? What passport were you given?
translation.zh: ‎你拿到了什么？ ‎你的护照是什么样的？

translation.en: Wachuka Otieno from Kenya.
Mine is Thandie Zwane from South Africa.
How are you?
I want to ask you something.
What is it?
Please let me use your phone.
But I don't have a phone.
-You have a phone. -No, I do not.
I know you have a phone. I saw you with it earlier.
translation.zh: ‎你有手机 我之前看到你打手机了

translation.en: No. I don't have one.
I want to call my mom quickly.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想打给我妈 很快的

translation.en: -I didn't know phones weren't allowed. -No. No.
translation.zh:
‎-我之前不知道不准带手机
‎-不

translation.en: I just want her to know Beauty and I are okay.
translation.zh: ‎我只是想让她知道美人和我没事

translation.en: Please.
But it's not safe.
Look, I won't talk for longer than 30 seconds.
I don't like this.
Please.
Please be very careful.
Trust me. Trust me.
Please.
I will leave it under your pillow tonight.
translation.zh: ‎我今晚会把它放到你枕头下

translation.en: Okay.
Thank you.
Who is calling me so late?
Hello.
Mom, it's me. Please don't get upset. I can't speak for long right now.
translation.zh:
‎妈 是我 别生气
‎我现在不能跟你久聊

translation.en: Thank God you called me. What's going on?
translation.zh:
‎谢天谢地你打来了
‎你们那边情况如何？

translation.en: My mind is not at peace. How is Beauty? Hope she is fine.
translation.zh:
‎我心里很乱
‎美人怎么样？希望她还好

translation.en: She's fine. I can't talk much right now.
translation.zh: ‎美人没事 我现在不能讲太久

translation.en: I'll call you when I can.
What are you doing? You are very stupid. Give me that phone.
translation.zh: ‎你在干什么？你真蠢 给我手机

translation.en: Come on! Get out of here!
Out!
Everyone, wake up and go to the pool! Now!

translation.en: If you're still asleep, you'll die anyway.
translation.zh: ‎如果你们还睡 迟早会死

translation.en: Out! Didn't you hear me? Move!
Run, run, run!
What did I say about phones?
What did I say?
I said no phones.
I said anyone caught with a phone will be in serious trouble.
translation.zh:
‎我说过任何人
‎被发现藏手机会有大麻烦

translation.en: Not only does she have a phone, she has been spying on us!
translation.zh: ‎她不只有手机 还一直监视我们！

translation.en: No.
Using it to send information about where we are.
translation.zh: ‎用它发信息 告诉别人我们的位置

translation.en: No! No.
No. No.
No...
-Linda... -No.
-Linda... -Please. No.
Linda!
-Quiet! -Linda!
Everyone go pack your things and get ready.
translation.zh: ‎你们所有人都去收拾东西准备

translation.en: We are leaving now!
Are you all deaf? Move!
Move!
Why did you have to kill her?
She was sending information to someone. Who was she?
translation.zh:
‎她在发短信
‎汇报我们的行动 她是谁？

translation.en: What if she is from the police?
-I don't know. -Wrong answer. It's your job to know.
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道
‎-回答错误 你的职责就是了解一切

translation.en: -You're supposed to investigate. -I did all my checks.
translation.zh:
‎-你该调查清楚的
‎-我调查过了

translation.en: Well, you didn't do a good job.
I swear if this doesn't turn out well, you'll be in big trouble.

‎我告诉你 如果出了什么差错
‎你就人头落地

translation.en: -Do you know where her family lives? -Of course. I know.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道她家人住哪儿吗？
‎-我当然知道

‎让他们知道他们惹不起我们

Beauty.
Please change your clothes.
Please.
-Take those girls. -Okay, boss.

‎我们走吧 起来！

Move. I said move!
Avoid their faces in case we still need them.

This one's a rural girl. Take her away.

translation.en: She's an idiot. She doesn't know anything.

I'm not too sure about this one.
What do you know about the phone?
I don't know anything.
-What do you know about the phone? -Nothing.

‎-你知道那部手机的事吗？
‎-不知道

translation.en: -What do you know about the phone? -Nothing.

‎-你知道那部手机的事吗？
‎-不知道

translation.en: You don't know anything?
-You don't know anything? -I don't know--
translation.zh:
‎-你什么都不知道？
‎-我什么都不…

translation.en: Do you think I am joking?
What do you know about the phone?
Do you think I'm a rookie?
Are you crazy? What do you know about the phone?

translation.en: -You want to ruin my business, right? -No.
You want to ruin my business, right?
You don't want to talk?
You don't want to talk, right?
What happened?
Looks like they got away before we got here.
translation.zh: ‎看起来我们到这儿前 他们已经走了

translation.en: They must have been tipped off. They left in a hurry.

‎一定有人向他们通风报信了
‎他们走得很匆忙

Go to the poolside at the back of the house.
There's a body lying there. Check if it's not your reporter.

‎那躺着一具尸体
‎看看是否是你的记者

translation.en: Mr. Victor.
An important person.
Mr. Victor.
-How are you? -I'm good. How are things with you?

‎-你好吗？
‎-我很好 你怎么样？

translation.en: -How are you? -I'm well.
-Hope the business is thriving? -The usual, we keep pushing.
translation.zh:
‎-生意兴隆吧？
‎-还是老样子 我们继续努力

translation.en: Miss?
Where are you going?
-I want to pee. -I need to have a shit.
You're full of shit.
We are about to cross the border and you guys need to go shit!

Fast, no time!
Let go of her hand! Keep going.
This way!
Move!
Where are your papers?
What are you transporting? I want to know what you're taking across the border.

‎你们运的是什么？
‎我要知道你们带什么过境

translation.en: I said, open your trunk. I want to see if you're carrying anything illegal.

‎我看看里面有没有违法的东西

translation.en: "You're not carrying much." That's what they always say.

‎“你的东西不多”
‎他们总是这么说的

I'm a journalist. As a matter of fact, this is a matter of life and death.
It is important. My staff is there. I need to be there.

‎非常紧要
‎我的员工在里面 我得进去

translation.en: Please understand my point.
You understand me now. I said shut up, get in the car and leave.

-Help me! -Help us!
Help! Help us! Help!
Help! Someone help! Someone!
Where the hell did she run off to?
What's wrong with her? What kind of nonsense is that?

translation.en: Close the door.
What's going on here?
See. I'm trying to-- See...
I am a journalist. There's an emergency I need to attend to.

‎我必须进去

translation.en: Somebody's life is at stake.
This place is a military zone. Go back!
-I understand that. -I said go back.
Will you please look--
-Go back! -Just calm down now.
Try to listen to me and understand what I'm trying to say.

You don't... You're not...
